query: query ConsultaMedicaCompleta($email: String!) { getUserProfile(query: $email) { userId name firstName lastName email phone company jobTitle subscriptionStatus plan planStatus medicalPlan nextBillingAmount nextBillingDate billingCycle customerId subscriptionId contactId lastActivity dealStage leadScore planIncludedPackage planName pxInformation specialistsAssigned supplies lastPrescription zero lastTwoPayments { id status type createdAt total amount currency description } paymentHistory { id status type createdAt total amount currency description } emailAdress medicine medicineCount selfSupplyLogs allergies emergencyContact { name phone relationship } lastAppointment { appointmentId date type doctor status location notes } nextAppointment { appointmentId date type doctor status location notes } treatments healthSummary { currentWeight height bmi bloodPressure { systolic diastolic date } vitalSigns { heartRate temperature respiratoryRate oxygenSaturation recordedAt } medications { name dosage frequency startDate prescribedBy } allergies { substance severity reaction } conditions { name diagnosedDate status treatingPhysician } labResults { testName value unit referenceRange date status } medicalHistory { previousSurgeries familyHistory chronicConditions } progressMetrics { weightLoss glucoseLevels bloodPressureReadings medicationAdherence } clinicalNotes { note date physician type } } lastTicket { ticketId subject status priority createdAt assignedTo } sourceBreakdown { field value source } suggestions } }
